label: W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of gluttony. The odor of rotting food fills the air around it
column4: attracting both animals and insects.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of lust. A seductive smell fills the air around it
column4: while suspicious shadows lie in wait for some dark purpose.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of sloth. The air is dank and stagnant
column4: and listless things lie about here and there.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of wrath. Aggression fills the air around it
column4: while warriors with bloodshot eyes do battle nearby.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_GLUTTONY_SUPER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: he who devours all
column5: lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_LUST_SUPER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: he who derives pleasure from the suffering of others
column5: lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_SLOTH_SUPER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: he who uses others to carry out his evil will
column5: lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_RAGE_SUPER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: he who is ever burning with rage
column5: lives in this tower. It has a deeply distorted presence.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The headstones in this graveyard stick haphazardly out of the ground like crooked teeth. It is said you can still hear the groans of those buried here.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_TOWN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A town full of lifeless beings devoid of all vitality. Its residents show no attachment to life.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_WELL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: An old well. You've no idea how deep it goes
column4: and no one has ever tried gathering water from it.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_ROSE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: A ruin that somewhat resembles the watchtower it used to be. It's covered in roses and ivy.

label: W03_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This building towers into the sky in the center of Yomi. It is home to this world's ruler
column4: the Dismal King.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_TOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of gluttony. The odor of rotting food fills the air around it
column4: attracting both animals and insects.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Can you acquire enough food to satisfy the Warden of Gluttony?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: You've heard you might obtain ingredients from this well that can satisfy even the Warden of Gluttony.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Does this town contain the secret to defeating the Warden of Gluttony in an eating contest?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_TOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of lust. A seductive smell fills the air around it
column4: while suspicious shadows lie in wait for some dark purpose.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The sound of howling wolves fills the air. Perhaps you should stay away from this place.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_SLOTH_TOWER_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of sloth. The air is dank and stagnant
column4: and listless things lie about here and there.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: One of the watchtowers built to protect the Dark Castle. It presides over the dark virtue of wrath. Aggression fills the air around it
column4: while warriors with bloodshot eyes do battle nearby.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Rematch with the Flames of Wrath

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_020_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Another battle with the Warden of Wrath seems unavoidable.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_030_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This may be the perfect chance to acquire the key you seek.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_DOOR_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: This building towers into the sky in the center of Yomi. It is home to this world's ruler
column4: the Dismal King. The entrance is sealed.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Open the doors of the Dark Castle so you might meet the Dismal King.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: It seems you have no choice but to once more meet with Dolores
column4: the Warden of Pride.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RAGE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The warden refuses to accept the Dismal King's revival. Is fighting the only option here?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Gluttony

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Lust

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_LUST_100_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_TITLE
speaker: UI
text: Surrounded by Thralls: Tower of Sloth

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_100_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The Dismal King's thralls have surrounded the tower. There's no point in stopping here.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_SLOTH_200_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: There's no need to draw closer to the watchtower since you already flew past it.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_TOWN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Will you find any of the king's thralls in the lifeless town? And if you do
column4: will they be of any use?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_RUIN_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: Will you find a way to smuggle the king to safety here?

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_FLY_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
column4: but first you must overcome one more trial.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: If you can take the king from this world
column4: his power will apparently return.

label: W03_EVAR_COMM_LEVELUP_BATTLE_000_DETAIL
speaker: UI
text: The air in the town is positively murderous. Though filled with both fiends and fierce warriors who seek to repel them
column4: everyone is just fighting whoever's closest.
